articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Umar Akmal has been banned from all representative cricket for three years by the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) after pleading guilty to failing to report corrupt approaches.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: ESPN Cric Info revisited the full 1992 World Cup final, analyzing how white-ball cricket has evolved over the years, particularly in aspects like wides, lbw calls, and swing.

articles.title: Mumbai Indians vs Delhi Capitals - IPL 2025 Showdown
articles.description: Mumbai Indians and Delhi Capitals battle for the final playoff spot in IPL 2025.
articles.content: Mumbai Indians currently hold 14 points, while Delhi Capitals have 13, making this match crucial for both teams.

articles.title: Delhi Capitals Win Toss, Opt to Bowl First
articles.description: DC won the toss and chose to field first in IPL 2025 match against MI.
articles.content: Axar Patel is missing out due to sickness, with Faf du Plessis leading the team instead.

articles.title: Rain Threat Looms Over MI vs DC Match
articles.description: Heavy rain and thunderstorms are predicted in Mumbai, potentially affecting the IPL match.
articles.content: A Yellow Alert has been issued, with an 80% chance of rain.

articles.title: Ravi Shastri on Virat Kohliâ€™s Future
articles.description: Former Indian coach Ravi Shastri believes Virat Kohli will step away from cricket entirely after retirement.
articles.content: Shastri states that Kohli will not take up coaching or broadcasting roles post-retirement.

articles.title: Where to Watch MI vs DC Live
articles.description: The IPL 2025 match between MI and DC will be telecast live on Star Sports Network and streamed on JioHotstar.
articles.content: Fans can watch the match live on Star Sports Network and JioHotstar.
